rules.description: cmd+e to cmd+shift+e for cycle last used tab in firefox
Option+P to change karabiner profile
Option+c s to control center
map control + arrows to command + arrows for back and forward
map command+h to ctrl+h
map command+letter to ctrl+letter in specific apps like terminal or jetbrains
Remap option+q to command+w, to close tabs/windows on macOS.
Launch apps by (left) option + number.
Ctrl/Option/Command + Tab Change
Swap Right Command and Right Option for all keyboards.
command + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
command + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
command + Arrow Keys to Option + Arrow Keys and option+arrow turned to option+command for rectangle
